name: Power Boat Race
overview: A water sports game also published in o Games n.7 (March 1986) as Fuori Bordo (Or in English: Out of Edge). You are driving a powerful outboard and you have to make a route, with a certain number of laps, in a very limited time. Of course, the route has many pitfalls, which we do not reveal to you so that you can discover them yourself in the action of the moment! So, always be alert and ready to dodge.
